text: 10|83|ennal musaye tanre janatayil ninnulla cila ceruppakkarallate marrarum visvasiccilla. (at tanne) phir'aunum avarilulla pradhanikalum avare marddiccekkumea enna bhayappateatukutiyayirunnu. tirccayayum phir'aun bhumiyil aunnatyam natikkunnavan tanneyakunnu. tirccayayum avan atirukavinnavarute kuttattilttanneyakunnu
